title: Arabic 17
text: Be thou content with Me and seek no other helper. For none but Me can ever suffice thee.

prev.title: Arabic 16
prev.text: Forget all save Me and commune with My spirit. This is of the essence of My command, therefore turn unto it.

next.title: Arabic 18
next.text: Ask not of Me that which We desire not for thee, then be content with what We have ordained for thy sake, for this is that which profiteth thee, if therewith thou dost content thyself.
